review: I love it.  I no longer have cable.  It's like having a DVR.. and with Amazon Prime and apps like HULU and CRACKLE there is always something to watch.  I have been using for 6 months now and love the weather and news apps.  So many more choices than cable.
author: HATE AMAZON

review: Been using the Fire Stick for approximately 5 days. very easy to install and begin using.
author: joedaddy

review: I have both the Chromecast and Amazon Fire TV Stick. I prefer the Fire TV Stick because it will stream both Netflix and Amazon Prime. I really like the Fire TV Stick.
author: Santa Fe Jim

review: For the past couple months I have been really upset with myself for not buying this when it first came out for $20 at Christmastime last year.  This past week is was on sale for $34 (maybe because of father's day?) so I went ahead and purchased it for my husband.  We used it for the first time last night and we already love it!!  We have one smart tv in our house that lets us view netflix, amazon prime, and a couple others, but this has so many other options and access to music apps like pandora, Iheartradio, and others!  We will be moving soon and have decided to only get internet service and not cable/satellite.  I honestly don't think cable/satellite will be missed!
author: Sara E Pluta

review: Not a great improvement over my DVD player with access to netflix/hulu/etc.  I was assumed that this, being an amazon product, would have access to amazon apps.  It cannot play audible.  I don't know about anything else, but after I discovered this I just unplugged it and reconnected my DVD player.It does install very smoothly though.  I have to give it that.
author: Amazon Customer

review: This is so handy - turns any tv with HDMI port into a smart tv!  Easy setup once you're in, and the lead time for loading content is quicker than the apps on my blu-ray player.
author: Lindsay

review: This is what I needed to watch movies on my Amazon prime at Home. Doing it over my blue Ray player Just didn't work well. For $40 it make life a lot easier.
author: Darrell

review: Clever device.  Works as advertised.  I like that other Google apps can be installed, but the process is definitely not intuitive.  Would like it to derive power from the HDMI port if possible.  Not having to use the power supply would make it much more portable.Regarding content - it does exactly as you'd expect, but the selection process is a little cumbersome.  What I'd really like to see (and I know this isn't Amazon's responsibility) is to have live feeds off the TV channels like National Geographic and The Weather Channel.
author: Matt Z "Matt"
